title: Winter CMS form configuration
description: Defines a tabs and fields that will be visible in Winter CMS forms

^[^_][^\\s]+@create$.title: Model field (create context)
^[^_][^\\s]+@create$.description: Represents a field whose value will be saved and read from the corresponding attribute of a model. This field will only show when creating a record

^_[^\\s]+@create$.title: Display field (create context)
^_[^\\s]+@create$.description: Represents a field that is used for display purposes, and won't be saved in the model when the form is saved. This field will only show when creating a record

^[^_][^\\s]+@update$.title: Model field (update context)
^[^_][^\\s]+@update$.description: Represents a field whose value will be saved and read from the corresponding attribute of a model. This field will only show when updating a record

^_[^\\s]+@update$.title: Display field (update context)
^_[^\\s]+@update$.description: Represents a field that is used for display purposes, and won't be saved in the model when the form is saved. This field will only show when updating a record

^[^_][^\\s]+@preview$.title: Model field (preview context)
^[^_][^\\s]+@preview$.description: Represents a field whose value will be saved and read from the corresponding attribute of a model. This field will only show when previewing a record

^_[^\\s]+@preview$.title: Display field (preview context)
^_[^\\s]+@preview$.description: Represents a field that is used for display purposes, and won't be saved in the model when the form is saved. This field will only show when previewing a record

^[^_][^\\s]+$.title: Model field
^[^_][^\\s]+$.description: Represents a field whose value will be saved and read from the corresponding attribute of a model

^_[^\\s]+$.title: Display field
^_[^\\s]+$.description: Represents a field that is used for display purposes, and won't be saved in the model when the form is saved

label.title: Label
label.description: The label displayed above the form field to the user. If this is not defined, a label will be automatically generated from the field name. Set to `false` to hide the label on the form

type.title: Field type
type.description: Defines the type of field to render

span.title: Span
span.description: Sets the alignment of the field in the form. Options: `auto`, `left`, `right`, `full` and `storm`

placeholder.title: Placeholder
placeholder.description: Defines an informative hint in the field that disappears when a value is entered

comment.title: Comment (below field)
comment.description: Adds a description underneath the field, useful for hints or context

commentAbove.title: Comment (above field)
commentAbove.description: Adds a description above the field but beneath the label, useful for hints or context

commentHtml.title: Allow HTML in comment
commentHtml.description: If true, the comment may contain HTML markup

default.title: Default value
default.description: Defines the default value for this field, which will be used if no value is entered

defaultFrom.title: Default value from another field
defaultFrom.description: Defines the default value as the value from another field in the form

fields.title: Primary tab fields
fields.description: Defines the fields for this form that will be displayed within the primary tabs

fields.title: Outside form fields
fields.description: Defines the fields for this form that will be displayed outside any tab navigation

tabs.title: Primary tabs
tabs.description: Enables the primary tab navigation on this form
